title: Show HN: Journelly for iOS: like tweeting but for your eyes only (in plain text)
summary: The text describes a new iOS app called Journelly, which is a note-taking and journaling app that is designed to be easy to use and similar to social media. The app is powered by Org markup and is available for a one-time fee of $19.99. The creator of the app is open to feedback and suggestions for improvement, and is actively working on adding new features and improving the app's functionality. The app has received positive reviews from users and is seen as a unique and innovative solution for digital journaling.
